name: AlFajrAdhan
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: morning adhan
des:
Do you use Alexa for Fajr alarm? Is it using the standard alarm sounds? Do you you want to be woken up to a beautiful Fajr Adhan instead? if the answer is yes, then this skill is for you.

Alfajr Adhan is a simple skill that you configure in the routine action to be played on a given time, it will simply play the adhan. That is all this skill does.

Please note that audio is in Arabic, which is translated to English as follows
God is Great! God is Great! God is Great! God is Great!
I bear witness that there is no god except the One God.
I bear witness that there is no god except the One God.
I bear witness that Muhammad is the messenger of God.
I bear witness that Muhammad is the messenger of God.
Hurry to the prayer. Hurry to the prayer.
Hurry to salvation. Hurry to salvation.
God is Great! God is Great!
There is no god except the One God.
Prayer is better than sleep. Prayer is better than sleep.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
